cancellationPolicies.label: Deposit Only rates
cancellationPolicies.description: This property has a 1 day cancellation policy. Failure to cancel within this time will result in a cancellation charge equal to the first night of your stay, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information).

cancellationPolicies.label: Non-refundable rates
cancellationPolicies.description: Your booking is non-refundable. If you choose to cancel your booking, or in the case of a no-show, you will still be charged the full cost of your booking.

dorms.name: Standard 12 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: Private individual single POD in a 12Pod share room for solo traveler. Featuring safe & secure lockable storage, king single mattress with USB & power points, in-built ventilation. Free Wi-Fi and access to shared kitchen, bathroom & laundry facilities.

paymentProcedure.label: Non-refundable
paymentProcedure.description:
Non-refundable
Your booking is non-refundable. The property will charge you the full amount at any time after your booking confirmation, even if you cancel or don’t show up.

rateRuleViolationsMessages.description: Requires a minimum of 3 nights stay on your dates

dorms.name: Standard 4 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: The Pods are our self-contained capsules, perfect for that solo traveler. Pods come with bed linen, storage net, charging stations, storage locker and temperature control

dorms.name: Standard 8 Bed Female Dorm
dorms.description: Female dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer female accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: Private individual single POD in a Female share room for Female solo traveler. Featuring safe &secure lockable storage, king single mattress with USB &power points, in-built ventilation. Free Wi-Fi &access to shared kitchen, bathroom & laundry facilities.

freeCancellation.label: Free Cancellation rates
freeCancellation.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 30th Dec 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 30th Dec 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.
